titles.title: Directing the Chief Administrative Officer of the House of Representatives to enter into contracts with nationally- or regionally-known franchises for the provision of food services in the cafeteria of the Longworth House Office Building in a food court setting.

Directing the Chief Administrative Officer of the House of Representatives to enter into contracts with nationally- or regionally-known franchises for the provision of food services in the cafeteria of the Longworth House Office Building in a food court setting.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: Directs the Chief Administrative Officer of the House of Representatives (CAO) to ensure that all food services provided in the cafeteria of the Longworth House Office Building are provided under contracts entered into by the CAO with nationally- or regionally-known food service franchises under which a variety of cuisines are provided to customers in a food court setting.
